summary: The Endometrial Cancer Research and Education Act of 2025 aims to expand research and education on endometrial cancer. The bill directs the National Institutes of Health (NIH) to increase research efforts, address disparities in diagnosis, particularly among African-American women, and ensure their representation in clinical trials. It also mandates the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to create and disseminate public educational materials on the disease, including information targeting African-American women.
